module.name: IntfGraphics
module.short: Classes and functions for easy handling of raw images (interface images).

element.name: TLazIntfImage
element.short: Represents a graphical image.

descr.p: TLazIntfImage is a TFPCustomImage descendant which stores the image data as TRawImage, and is therefore able to interchange images directly with the LCL interfaces.
A large number of the protected methods (GetColorxxxxxx and SetColorxxxxxx) deal with direct interface to the operating system at the pixel level.
1. Loading an .xpm file into a TBitmap:
2. Saving a TBitmap to an .xpm file:

element.name: TLazIntfImage.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.CreateCompatible
element.short: Alternate constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.Assign
element.short: Stores values from the specified persistent object into the current class instance.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.BeginUpdate
element.short: Increments the internal update counter.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.EndUpdate
element.short: Decrements the internal update counter.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.SetSize
element.short: SetSize - define the height and width of the image.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.CheckDescription
element.short: CheckDescription - looks at the supplied Image Description record and returns True if it matches the actual properties of the image.
element.errors: Generates an exception if an error is encountered in the image description

element.name: TLazIntfImage.LoadFromDevice
element.short: LoadFromDevice - loads the image from the device with specified handle.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.LoadFromBitmap
element.short: LoadFromBitmap - loads the image from a Bitmap.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.CreateBitmaps
element.short: CreateBitmaps - generates a Bitmap and an optional Mask for the image data.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.SetRawImage
element.short: Stores the raw image data in the class instance.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.GetRawImage
element.short: Gets the raw image data stored in the class instance and optionally release ownership.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.FillPixels
element.short: Sets the color for all pixels in the raw image data to the specified value.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.AlphaBlend
element.short: Merges a source image with alpha blending.

descr.p: Merges an image to a canvas using alpha blending according to a separate image containing the alpha channel. White pixels in the alpha channel will correspond to the source image pixel being fully drawn, grey ones are merged and black ones ignored.
If ASourceAlpha is Nil then it will utilize the alpha channel from ASource.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.AlphaFromMask
element.short: Gets the alpha value from the mask if needed.

descr.p: AlphaFromMask gets the alpha value from the mask if AKeepAlpha is True (default condition).

element.name: TLazIntfImage.GetXYDataPostion
element.short: GetXYDataPosition - finds the position of the raw image.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.GetXYMaskPostion
element.short: GetXYMaskPostion - finds the position of the raw image mask.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.GetDataLineStart
element.short: Returns an pointer to the raw data for a scan line.

descr.p: Similar to Delphi's TBitmap.ScanLine. Works with scan lines aligned to whole bytes.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.PixelData
element.short: PixelData - the raw image data for the image.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.MaskData
element.short: MaskData - the raw data for the mask in the image.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.DataDescription
element.short: DataDescription - the raw description record for the current image.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.TColors
element.short: TColors - the colors available for the specified pixel.

element.name: TLazIntfImage.Masked
element.short: Masked - whether the image mask applies at the specified position.

element.name: TLazIntfImageMask
element.short: TLazIntfImageMask - applying a mask at the Raw Image level.

element.name: TLazIntfImageMask.Image
element.short: Image - the image to which masking is applied.

element.name: TLazAVLPalette
element.short: Descendant of TFPPalette which uses an AVL tree for speed up.

element.name: TLazAVLPalette.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TArrayNode.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TArrayNode.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TArrayNodesTree.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TArrayNodesTree.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: ILazImageReader is an interface used to extend TFPCustomImageReader to initialize a TRawImgeDescription based on the image to be read.

element.name: TLazReaderXPM
element.short: TLazReaderXPM - this is a FPImage reader for xpm images.

element.name: TLazReaderXPM.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazReaderXPM.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazWriterXPM
element.short: TLazWriterXPM is a FPImage writer for xpm images.

element.name: TLazWriterXPM.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazReaderMaskMode.lrmmNone
element.short: No mask is generated.

element.name: TLazReaderMaskMode.lrmmAuto
element.short: A mask is generated based on the first pixel read.

descr.p: Note: when reading images with an alpha channel and the alpha channel has no influence on the mask (the maskcolor is transparent).

element.name: TLazReaderMaskMode.lrmmColor
element.short: A mask is generated based on the given color.

descr.p: Note: when reading images with an alpha channel and the alpha channel has no influence on the mask (the maskcolor is transparent).

element.name: TLazReaderDIBEncoding.lrdeJpeg
element.short: For completeness - don't know if they exist.

element.name: TLazReaderDIBEncoding.lrdePng
element.short: For completeness - don't know if they exist.

element.name: TLazReaderDIBEncoding.lrdeHuffman
element.short: For completeness - don't know if they exist.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FMaskColor
element.short: Color which should be interpreted as masked.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FMaskIndex
element.short: For palette based images, index of the color which should be interpreted as masked.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FReadSize
element.short: Size (in bytes) for a scanline.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FDIBInfo
element.short: Information about the bitmap as read from the stream.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FPalette
element.short: Buffer with Palette entries.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FLineBuf
element.short: Buffer for ascanline. Can be Byte, Word, TColorRGB or TColorRGBA.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FUpdateDescription
element.short: If set, rawimagedescription is updated.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FContinue
element.short: For progress support.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.FIgnoreAlpha
element.short: If alpha channel is declared but does not exist (all values = 0).

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazReaderDIB.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TLazReaderBMP
element.short: TLazReaderBMP - This is an improved FPImage reader for bmp images.

element.name: TLazReaderBMP.FDataOffset
element.descr: Some bitmaps can specify the data offset.

element.name: TLazReaderIconDIB
element.short: Implements an image reader for a single DIB in an icon file.

descr.p: TLazReaderIconDIB is a FPImage reader for a single DIB from an icon file.

element.name: TLazReaderTiff
element.short: Extends the FCL TIFF image reader to support the ILazImageReader interface.

descr.p: Defined for LCL versions prior to 2.06.01, where the OnCreateImage event is "abused" to update the description after the format and before the image is read.

element.name: TLazWriterTiff
element.short: Extends the FCL TIFF image writer to support the ILazImageWriter interface.

element.name: TLazReaderIcnsPart.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance, and calls the inherited constructor on entry. Create initializes members in the class instance, and sets the default value for IconType to iitNone.

element.name: TLazReaderIcnsPart.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Destroy is the overridden destructor for the class instance. Destroy frees resources allocated for members, and calls the inherited destructor prior to exit.
